job.title: Front-End Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: At ASM we build bestinclass products for health care administration and quality assurance We use the latest technology to provide products to over 1200 health care organizations worldwide Founded in 1982 we have developed a great team to build great productsbrbrstrongWhat would I do at ASMbrbrstrongDesign with a fast simple UI is one of the key selling points for our products In this role you will help build new features and products You will primarily working in React building components for both our component library and userfacing applications When necessary you will aid in designing and building APIs to connect to the frontend You will need to rely on an understanding of visual design UX and frontend technologies to craft changes that have an impactbrbrstrongWho is the ideal candidate brbrstrongYou understand the importance of user experience and frontend technologies You empathize with the struggles of endusers and advocate on their behalf You get excited solving design challenges with other developers building reusable components and then continuing to improve those designs and componentsbrbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliDesigning implementing and maintaining user interfaces for our web and mobile products from initial concepts through to the final productliliConceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex ideasliliImprove and maintain our React and ASPNET frontend componentsliliConnect our frontend components to the API and databasesbrbrliulstrongRequired ExperiencebrstrongulliProficiency in HTML CSS and JavascriptliliExperience with React JSliliTo care deeply about aesthetics and usabilityliliA strong attention to detailliliA solid understanding of layout typography color and other design
